title: hazardous_material_spill
description: A corrosive chemical spill in a lab corridor escalates over time.

timeline.title: Spill Detection
timeline.description: Small chemical puddle observed in lab corridor. Identify substance and restrict access.

timeline.title: Area Evacuation
timeline.description: Fumes detected causing respiratory irritation. Evacuate immediate area and seal doors.

timeline.title: Ventilation Shutdown
timeline.description: Spill spreading to hallway. Shut down HVAC to prevent contamination spread. Alert hazmat team.

timeline.title: Hazmat Team Notification
timeline.description: Specialized hazmat team dispatched, ETA 15 minutes. Provide chemical safety data sheets.

timeline.title: Containment Operations
timeline.description: Hazmat team on-site beginning containment. Spill neutralized and contained with absorbent barriers.

timeline.title: Decontamination and Cleanup
timeline.description: Area decontaminated and cleared. Resume normal ventilation and conduct air quality testing.
